name: Echo
description: Echo is an oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its unique traits and abilities, Echo stands out as a fascinating member of the club. Its box-like body resembles a sleek cat, while its button controls resemble a playful feline's buttons. Equipped with hand-like arms and legs positioned downward, Echo moves with agility and precision. The screen on its body displays a mesmerizing snake pattern, captivating anyone who gazes upon it.
